amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike a provision in title I which treats one county in California not eligible to receive impact assistance as if it were eligible to receive such funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 106-612 to strike a provision in Title I of the bill which treats one county in California not eligible to receive impact assistance as if it were eligible to receive funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chenoweth-Hage amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 259 (Roll no. 168).
